title: I Got Perma Banned
body:

I don't int, I don't do any other toxic stuff deserving of a perma ban, maybe a severe  chat ban... but not perma ban... replies.body: This is actually a fairly toxic chat log, so I don't think you will get much traction trying to get this ban reversed.
"fairly toxic" is key... it is not deserving of a perma ban, maybe a horrible chat ban but not a perma....

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-11-05T22:29:45.058+0000)
>
> "fairly toxic" is key... it is not deserving of a perma ban, maybe a horrible chat ban but not a perma....

If you already had a 14-day ban, this would escalate you. If you had a 25-game chat restriction, this *might* escalate you, but it would be unlikely.
Do you think riot will reduce a perma ban? I've played for years, and all my other accounts have been clean.. or is it GG

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T22:57:59.692+0000)
>
> Do you think riot will reduce a perma ban? I've played for years, and all my other accounts have been clean.. or is it GG

For this behavior, no, I do not think they well. This is significantly over the line -- it's not just a minor hiccup that got you punished while you were attempting to reform.
how is saying garbage and cracking harmful jokes over the line... there was no racist comments or intent to hurt someone.. it was just harmful banter between teamates..

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:06:13.181+0000)how is saying garbage and cracking harmful jokes over the line...

Before I answer -- are you looking for an actual explanation of why Riot considers this over the line out of an honest desire to have it explained, or are you merely asking out of a predetermined opinion that this behavior is okay? I'm happy to answer, but I do want to make sure the explanation is actually desired.
never said this is ok... i said that this is not worth a perma ban..

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:14:15.079+0000)
>
> never said this is ok... i said that this is not worth a perma ban..

Bans escalate if you do not show proper reform. If you had a previous 14-day ban, this behavior -- which would earn a punishment -- would escalate you to the next level, which is a permanent ban.
What has league come toa sensitive community? like what I said did not deserve the next level. How can people function in their day to day life if they think saying garbage is next tier toxic

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:19:13.080+0000)
>
> What has league come toa sensitive community? like what I said did not deserve the next level. How can people function in their day to day life if they think saying garbage is next tier toxic

The consistent stream of insults and spam is what pushed you over, and *any* punishment without showing that you're actually reforming your behavior escalates you, as it is clear to the system that you have not learned that your behavior is not accepted here.

This is why this game is going downhill. We get trolls after trolls either feeding, trolling, or flamming chat... ofc we are going to get jaded after all those games. Look at my games played this year. After what feels like 1000 games played I was only toxic for 5

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=000200000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:28:27.520+0000)This is why this game is going downhill.

You are entitled to that opinion, but it is not a justifiable excuse for breaking the rules, or for ignoring the previous warnings that your behavior was not acceptable. I'm sorry, but the account is not going to be recoverable.

> Whatever dude this is honestly a joke... I've tried to be civil, but all I've received is a tongue lashing. This community and riot should be more forgiving to those who are the 75-80% getting stuck in the % of perma bans.. all I want is a reduced sentence as i have shown how untoxic i have been on other accounts

You showed on **this** account that you were unwilling to change your behavior and be a good member of the community.

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2018-11-06T22:13:34.997+0000)
>Buddy you've never played with me, so how would u know for sure that I'm a bad member of the community. I've never run into this problem before, and I've been playing since s3, so I can't be that bad of a summoner. Would love to see what you would say if you had to climb out of elo hell.

I don't actually know anything about your typical behavior, nor do I really want to make guesses. All I know is that I have a pretty good understanding of what sort of behavior it takes to earn a punishment, and the fact that you have means it is probable that you did display problematic behavior to an extent that is not allowed, even if it is not something that you normally do.

I have also heard fairly terrible things about silver MMR, and that is what I am currently climbing out of. My experience so far has been incredibly non-toxic, and the majority of my games I've actually been fairly friendly. I'm not saying that's indicative of ranked as a whole, but it has been my personal experience.

Buddy you've never played with me, so how would u know for sure that I'm a bad member of the community. I've never run into this problem before, and I've been playing since s3, so I can't be that bad of a summoner. Would love to see what you would say if you had to climb out of elo hell.

Your match history is public. Getting the friends you frequently duo with to come upvote you, downvote others, and offer up their opinions on your ban like they’re objective third parties is pretty weak.
yeah we are the ones who he flames dude xD. I can attest to him getting chat banned due to us. Nice to see you take the time out of your life to check that LOL

Not sure what your point is. Clearly other players have been uncomfortable with his behavior to the point of him receiving multiple punishments and finally a perma. If you all want to act like that in private, get a discord server or something.

How was everything a joke? I thought jokes were supposed to be funny? None of your chat made me laugh. 

But I do got a question... I'm assuming you must have gotten chat bans and stuff before.
Why would you not "T1 reform" from your first or second chat ban? It's not like its any secret that riot dislikes that kind of chatting.

Best of luck
My jokes have an acquired taste ;)..they made a /mute option for a reason... half the bans i got before i should have appealed because some were less then what i said this time around
Random strangers on the internet are never going to acquire that taste. You should have adjusted your conduct a long time ago, certainly after your recent 14-day ban.
ignorant that it went to 14 day ban to perma ban.. this has never happened to a clean gentleman like myself... riot needs to put in the steps in getting reported on the ban notice

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=00050000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:21:40.232+0000)riot needs to put in the steps in getting reported on the ban notice

The 14-day ban introduction specifically ends with the sentence "***If this behavior continues, your account will be permanently suspended.***" It is *very* clear.
14 - perma is a real huge jump my friend... still doesn't change the fact I was ignorant though. Tust me when i think i learned my lesson this time..

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=0005000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:32:50.356+0000)14 - perma is a real huge jump my friend...

Yep! Riot's testing indicated that adding more ban stages didn't really help players reform though, so we have the system we have now.

>...still doesn't change the fact I was ignorant though. Tust me when i think i learned my lesson this time..

I'm afraid that ignorance of the rules is not an excuse, especially when the message that a permanent suspension would follow was included in the punishment you received. If you did learn your lesson (which I doubt, frankly, given that you have claimed several times that your behavior was *not* that bad and that you don't think calling someone garbage is actually toxic), then the best thing to do is to make sure that any future accounts remain unbanned.
bro, you're actually soft if u think garbage is toxic, and should never have input on bans due to how jaded and how biased you are.

> [{quoted}](name=CapNPopNFresh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6UZ4Epj8,comment-id=000500000000000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:39:10.576+0000)
>

Fortunately for you I have no input on bans (as I'm not a Riot employee), but this is a good example of why Riot -- who does indeed consider calling others garbage to be toxic -- does not roll back permanent bans, because if you do not agree that behavior is a problem then chances are you will simply continue it. I haven't actually said my own opinion at any point here -- simply how Riot's system works and what it considers toxic.

75-80% of players never get a single punishment in League, much less enough punishments to merit a permanent suspension.

This post seems to have gone way out to left field. Let's get back on track.

CapNPopNFresh is asking for help about the perma ban. I am going to give my best take on it.

The crime is toxicity. The creators of the game do not like it. Half the community does not like it. I do not like it. 

He admitted that his chat was toxic. We good there. 

Should he get account banned? Definitely.  Chat bans were a warning. He chose to ignore them. Treat him like an adult and make him accept the consequences of his actions.

But perma banning CapNPop? Hell no. This is not the way to go about this. Instead of giving up on him, force him to be better. 

I personally believe anyone with intelligence can reform. Some people need that final slap on the wrist to really wake up. 

Here is the easiest solution :

Ban his account for 30 days. If he does not reform, ban it for 60 days. Then 90 days. Keep adding 30 days until he learns. 

Its amazing what time off can do for someone's clarity and attitude.
He had 14 days off from the game already

Finally someone with a brain!!! I respect what u have said and appreciate it. I agree with what you have said and wish there were more people like you on this forum.... instead of jumping on the hate bandwagon as most people here did.
No problem. Hope it all went well.

Mild?
This is simply just toxic. There's nothing mild about this.
As for your ban, you were banned because you were consistently toxic to where you used up all your penalty tiers. You just got off from a 14-day ban. Which was your last chance to reform. Instead, you ignored the warning and kept going down that path of officially losing the account Riot permitted you to borrow.

Chat toxicity is just as severe as ingame toxicity. 
They're treated evenly for they are frowned upon evenly.
the difference is there is a /mute option... i dont int games to waste peoples time

The community doesn't want either of them. That's why they report them.
Regardless of what kind of toxicity it is. If you're toxic, then you're going to get reported. 
Regardless if it's by chat or ingame.

Yea, but it doesn't mean we want any other future players dealing with that toxicity. 
Riot and the community wholeheartedly believe toxic players have no place in this community. That's why the policy exists. We prefer to keep players unmuted so we can communicate with them and have fun. But if players are going to ruin that for us, then they need to be warned or removed. Regardless of the case, toxicity has no place here and those kinds of players do not belong here.
